amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute clarifies that only paper balers that are in compliance with current American National Standards Institute standards can be loaded, but not operated or unloaded, by 16 and 17 year olds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment that clarifies that only machines that are in compliance with current American National Standards Institute standards could be loaded by 16 and 17 year olds.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Goodling.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodling amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
